SystemController
Class GameStateManager

java.lang.Object
  SystemController.GameStateManager

public class GameStateManager
extends java.lang.Object

Controller used to switch between the two states of the application: Menu or GamePlay. Also acts as a channel of communication for telling views to render new elements and passing user inputs.

Field Summary
static int GAMEPLAY
           
static int MENUSTATE
          This integers are used as constants to represent the state the game can be in at a given time
